scripts.build:packages: npm --prefix packages/components run build && npm --prefix packages/musical-conductor run build && npm --prefix packages/host-sdk run build && npm --prefix packages/manifest-tools run build && npm --prefix packages/canvas run build && npm --prefix packages/canvas-component run build && npm --prefix packages/control-panel run build && npm --prefix packages/header run build && npm --prefix packages/library run build && npm --prefix packages/library-component run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:host
scripts.dev:clean: npm run rebuild:mc && npm run clean:vite && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:all && npm run regenerate:ographx
scripts.artifacts:ci: npm run artifacts:build:signed && npm run artifacts:validate:strict && npm run artifacts:verify:signature && npm test && npm run artifacts:pack
scripts.pre:manifests: npm run regenerate:ographx && node scripts/sync-json-sources.js --srcRoot=catalog && npm run sync:json-components && node scripts/sync-json-sequences.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/generate-json-interactions-from-plugins.js && node scripts/generate-interaction-manifest.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/generate-topics-manifest.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/generate-layout-manifest.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/aggregate-plugins.js && node scripts/sync-plugins.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/sync-control-panel-config.js && node scripts/generate-versions-manifest.js
scripts.pretest: npm run regenerate:ographx:test-graph && node scripts/sync-json-sources.js --srcRoot=catalog && npm run sync:json-components && node scripts/sync-json-sequences.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/generate-topics-manifest.js --srcRoot=catalog && node scripts/aggregate-plugins.js && node scripts/sync-plugins.js --srcRoot=catalog
scripts.export:setup: node scripts/run-python.js -m ensurepip --upgrade && node scripts/run-python.js -m pip install --user playwright && node scripts/run-python.js -m playwright install chromium
scripts.packages:lint: npm --prefix packages/host-sdk run lint && npm --prefix packages/manifest-tools run lint
scripts.packages:clean: npm --prefix packages/host-sdk run clean && npm --prefix packages/manifest-tools run clean
scripts.ci: npm run pre:manifests && npm run lint && npm test && npm run e2e:cypress
scripts.e2e:cypress: npm run build && start-server-and-test preview http://localhost:4173 cy:run:preview
scripts.e2e:cypress:dev: npm run pre:manifests && start-server-and-test dev http://localhost:5173 cy:run
